issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When building a Windows application without the -T option {{appc run -p windows}} the build process errors out with the following

{code}
:\ProgramData\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\6.1.0.v20170107081537\windows\cli\commands\_build\config\deviceID.js:76
                                throw new Error(
          ^

h5.Steps to reproduce

# Build an application with {{appc run -p windows}}

h5.Actual result

Build errors with the above

h5.Expected result

Build should not error and build to an emulator
fields.summary: Windows: Build fails when no target is specified
fields.environment:
Windows 10 Pro
Appc core: 6.1.0
Appc NPM: 4.2.8
Ti SDK: 6.1.0.v20170107081537

VS 15 with Windows 10 SDK & Windows 8.1 SDK

comments.body:
Verified fix, error was not present when using {{appc run -p window}} with  6.1.0.v20170109110359
*Environment*
{code:java}
Operating System
Name                        = Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
Version                     = 10.0.14393
Architecture                = 64bit
# CPUs                      = 4
Memory                      = 17034395648
 
Node.js
Node.js Version             = 4.4.4
npm Version                 = 2.11.3
 
Titanium SDK
SDK Version                 =  6.1.0.v20170109110359
{code}
Closing Ticket.
